data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 201 believers in Sousse that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sousse, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Sousse, Tunisia.
Father, guide the church in Sousse, Tunisia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sousse to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Berber, Jofra people. 0.3% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, help the 201 believers in Sousse to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Sousse be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Over 99.55 percent of the people of Sousse are far from Jesus.
